title: "It's not too late" bold stressed calligraphic sans in Urban Outifitters e-mail
content:
Hey guys I saw this font in an email from UrbanOutfitters.com,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202080203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4887.jpg)

Does anyone have an idea of what it is? I've searched the forums, WhatTheFont returns with Peignot, but obviously it's not,

much appreciated!
author: ppk812

comments.content:
hmm thanks all about seb ,

Lydian is certainly similar, looks a bit too caligraphic for my tastes
